attributes.review:
SHREK

                                       Written by

                                William Steig & Ted Elliott

                                     SHREK
                         Once upon a time there was a lovely 
                         princess. But she had an enchantment 
                         upon her of a fearful sort which could 
                         only be broken by love's first kiss. 
                         She was locked away in a castle guarded 
                         by a terrible fire-breathing dragon. 
                         Many brave knights had attempted to 
                         free her from this dreadful prison, 
                         but non prevailed. She waited in the 
                         dragon's keep in the highest room of 
                         the tallest tower for her true love 
                         and true love's first kiss. (laughs) 
                         Like that's ever gonna happen. What 
                         a load of - (toilet flush)
 
               Allstar - by Smashmouth begins to play. Shrek goes about his 
               day. While in a nearby town, the villagers get together to go 
               after the ogre.
 
               NIGHT - NEAR SHREK'S HOME

                                     MAN1
                         Think it's in there?

                                     MAN2
                         All right. Let's get it!

                                     MAN1
                         Whoa. Hold on. Do you know what that 
                         thing can do to you?
 
                                     MAN3
                         Yeah, it'll grind your bones for it's 
                         bread.
 
               Shrek sneaks up behind them and laughs.

                                     SHREK
                         Yes, well, actually, that would be a 
                         giant. Now, ogres, oh they're much worse. 
                         They'll make a suit from your freshly 
                         peeled skin.

attributes.review: I just got a new iPhone and thought hey let’s download and review the trump app for YouTube and when I went I download it it took practically a month and I had to restart my phone and even after that my phone was glitching so bad it would even open to the home screen and the lock screen was on glitch mode and then it wouldn’t stop playing music it attracted bugs and rodents to my house and caused me to waste thousands of dollars on it I truly HATE this app.

attributes.review:
As soon as this app downloaded, after 45.98 hours of waiting patiently i opened the app and saw a glitchy screen with an 🍊. The apps glitching caused an unhearable sound wave to call out to many many GARGANTUAN  BULL worms.                                                   👁💧👄💧👁
ɪ.ʜᴀᴛᴇ.ᴡᴏʀᴍs.
Suddenly my whole house  crumbled and turned into lettuce and beets- after 7 minutes in counting a STAMPEDE of tortises and donkeys; like from shrek. The shallow grumble of the donkey riding tortises hooves finally caught up to my house. They continued eating until they grew m u t a n t. AND THEY WOULDNT GET OUTTA MY SWAMP. like- oml sista move on.✋After a two day suffer with mutant GARGANTUAN BULL worms and mutant donkey riding tortises eating the remains of my lettuce and beet house, the mixed mUtAnT mANuRe from them caused a WAVE of flies which then grew multiple heads and became huge from the mutant maNuRe.🌚By this time my family left me and im all alone in my wormy vegetable house. The many many mutant gargantuan bull worms continued to eat into multiple layers of the earths anatomy under my house and caused a HUGE hole leading to the core of the earth. Everyone fell in and now have died. This is day 562863 in the centre of the earth- this was all 🍊 fault.. 
        ~send help
